item.description:
English folk rock duo though they bring a few extra players on stage. Beautiful voices, harmonies, melodies, a lot of energy. Should be fun! Check out their new album Paradise. Opener is Air Waves, don't know who they are! Oh and only $9! TT The Bears website says they go on at 11:30 but it's a Friday so come on down.

We could meet at TT The Bears at 10 (by the bar?), but if someone has a better a place, please suggest it. I'm not too familiar with what's around that area.
item.name: Slow Club, 2/17/12 TT The Bears Cambridge
